thread.title: Michele In USA
thread.title_full: Hudson Reed USA reviewed by Michele In USA

author: Michele In USA
title: Michele In USA
text: Yet to install and review the 2 towel warming racks and one radiator. The design is good, the specifications helpful and the delivery was prompt. An effortless experience so far. I would give 5 stars if we had time to install and see if these items worked. I would assume they will.
